body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Roy Bryant and the customer's name is Kathleen Brooks.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Roy Bryant, and I'm with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Roy, I'm Kathleen Brooks. I'm looking for some guidance on purchasing a motorcycle.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Kathleen! I’d be happy to help you with that. Can I ask you a couple of questions first?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! What is your preferred riding experience? Are you a beginner, intermediate, or expert rider?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I would say I'm an intermediate rider.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! One more thing, if you don’t mind sharing, could you tell me your age, just to better assist you with suitable options?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information! Lastly, could you also provide me with your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! Thank you for the details, Kathleen. I really appreciate it. Let me gather some options for you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Roy. I’m looking forward to seeing what you find.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! Thank you so much for your time today, Kathleen. If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
